text: Hanki Zoani ran kumate'ma nemaniza kva vahera mago knare vahera omani'nazanki, negi nagi vahe mani'naze. Hagi knare antahi'zane vahe'mo'zama Isipi kini ne' Feroma antahi'zama ami'nazana, havi antahizanke ami'naze. Tamagra na'a agafare Ferona amanage huta nesamize? Tagra antahi'zane vahe'mofo mofavre mani'neta, ko'ma antahi'zane kinima fore hu'za mani'naza nagapinti vahe mani'none huta nehaze.
